title: I cant login
body: I cant login every time i try it keeps saying authenticating forever I waited 1 hour still nothing why is this happening I tried reinstalling the game but it still won't work please help

replies.body: Your network might be having issues reaching the authentication server, possibly by a block or something else.  My recommendation here would be to go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a fix.  A reinstall wouldn't really resolve network issues, but game files.  Let me know if that clears things up!
